thread.title: Colombia FM explains country's economic turnaround

title: Colombia FM explains country's economic turnaround
text:
Colombia FM explains country's economic turnaround 1:13am IST - 02:51 
Colombia’s economy is strengthening after a hit from falling oil prices and this year’s presidential election should not derail the country’s recovery, finance minister Mauricio Cardenas said on Friday.   
Colombia’s economy is strengthening after a hit from falling oil prices and this year’s presidential election should not derail the country’s recovery, finance minister Mauricio Cardenas said on Friday.  //reut.rs/2sk6XDn
